articles.title: UK gets ready for rollout of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine this week - ABC News
articles.description: The United Kingdom is preparing to become the first country to roll out the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine this week, initially making the shot available at hospitals before distributing stocks to doctors clinics.
